mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id as postId, p.place_id as placeId, p.user_id as userId, p.title as title, p.content as content, p.location_registered as locationRegistered, p.createDt as createDt, p2.placeName as placeName, p2.address as address, p2.longitude as longitude, p2.latitude as latitude FROM chattingWeb.post p LEFT JOIN chattingWeb.place p2 ON p.post_id = p2.post_id WHERE 1=1 AND p.user_yn = 'Y' AND p.user_id = #{userId} order by p.post_id desc , p.createDt LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
SELECT CEIL(count(*)/5) FROM chattingWeb.post p LEFT JOIN chattingWeb.place p2 ON p.post_id = p2.post_id WHERE 1=1 AND p.user_yn = 'Y' AND p.user_id = #{userId}
select * from chattingWeb.place p where 1=1 and p.place_id =#{placeId}
